basic.name: Plasma Cutter (Q)
basic.description: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by 25% for 4 seconds.

basic.name: Weapon Modes (W)
basic.description: Activate to change between Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon and Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb.Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon: Basic Attack speed increased by 150%.Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb: Basic Attacks have 1.25 increased range, deal 25% more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Warp (E)
basic.description: Warp to a targeted location, phasing out after 0.5 seconds, and arriving 0.75 seconds later.

heroic.name: Purification Salvo (R)
heroic.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

heroic.name: Planet Cracker (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

trait.name: Shield Capacitor (T)
trait.description: Fenix has a permanent 760 Shield which regenerates at 10% per second after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

1.name: Advanced Targeting
1.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

1.name: Arsenal Synergy
1.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

1.name: Mobile Offense
1.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

4.name: Target Acquired
4.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Inhibiting Energy
4.description: Every 10 seconds, Fenix's next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb active Slows all enemies hit by 60%, decaying in strength over 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Emergency Protocol
4.description: While Fenix has shields from Shield Capacitor, he gains 10% Movement Speed.  This bonus is increased to 15% when Fenix loses shields from Shield Capacitor.

7.name: Combat Advantage
7.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

7.name: Warp Warfare
7.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
7.description: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

10.name: Purification Salvo
10.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

10.name: Planet Cracker
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

13.name: Adanium Shell
13.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Dampening Field
13.description: Fenix gains 30 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

13.name: Rapid Recharge
13.description: The time before Shield Capacitor begins regenerating after taking damage is reduced by 2 seconds. Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

13.name: Auxiliary Shields
13.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Offensive Cadence
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Photonic Weaponry
16.description: Fenix deals 20% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
16.description: Basic Attacks with Repeater Cannon reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds. Basic Attacks with Phase Bomb active reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds per Hero hit.

20.name: Armageddon Beam
20.description: Planet Cracker's width increases by 100% over 1.5 seconds.Passive: Reduce Planet Cracker's cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Secondary Fire
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

20.name: Singularity Charge
20.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

20.name: Unconquered Spirit
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.
